channel.title: software-development on My Way
channel.description: Recent content in software-development on My Way

item.title: Make REST API more RESTful
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: In the world of web applications, REST APIs are bridges that connect different software and devices, allowing them to work together. In this beginner-friendly handbook, we’ll explore the best practices for designing RESTful APIs, making it easier for you to create powerful and user-friendly applications.

item.title: Starter to System Design
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Imagine you have to design a system for serving blogs to massive readers (10k tps). How would you design the system?
